<<<<<<< HEAD
Lex talionis, or, The author of Naked truth stript naked Fell, Philip, 1632 or 3-1682. Gunning, Peter, 1614-1684. Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
[2], 42 p.
Printed for Henry Brome ..., London : 1676.
"First ascribed to Dr. Peter Gunning; afterwards to Dr. William Lloyd; but on better grounds, it is ascribed to Rev. Philip Fell, Fellow of Eton College"--Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======

[2], 42 p.
Printed for Henry Brome ..., London : 1676.
"First ascribed to Dr. Peter Gunning; afterwards to Dr. William Lloyd; but on better grounds, it is ascribed to Rev. Philip Fell, Fellow of Eton College"--Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
